metadata.synopsis: A hostage calls for help and tells you how to release her by pulling a lever
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go near S_GLO_IronThrone_Group7_Prisoner1_06d864d4-924a-4595-8155-d96df5b5f97e and the AD will play automatically

0.speaker: Caralee Grollo
0.text: Hey! Get me out of here... The lever...
